QuestData.Title: Key to the Brig
QuestData.Description:
You can tell a lot about a troll by what they do when they learn who Zul truly is.
That Garza is a mutinous, foul-tusked, ship stealin' traitor. She is the kind of zealot dat will follow de heretic into the maw of an Old God.
I am more de type to rip out her tusks and beat her with dem.
I'd settle for ya taking her key and getting our wavemaster and crew free!
QuestData.LogDescription: Get the key from Quartermaster Garza.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lanfa on the deck below.
